Package io.rcktapp.rql.elastic

    Class Description
    BoolQuery

    Does nothing special other than a base class to extend from
    ElasticRql

    FuzzyQuery
    In Elastic, the value property of a Fuzzy query only works with a single value.
    NestedQuery  
    Order
    Very basic Elastic sorting.
    QueryDsl  
    Range
    The class properties are all annotated with JsonIgnore so that the Jackson ObjectMapper will use the JsonAnyGetter method instead.
